title: Software-Based Complex Systems Understanding Enhancement Program for Nanoscale Biosystem Design

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge in biology and engineering design, and intermediate-level understanding of mathematical modeling
context.additional_context: Utilizing smartphone-based software interfaces and constructing collaborative learning environments in classrooms

learning_goals: Learners can visually explain causal relationships between multi-level organizations of nanoscale biosystems through animation
Learners can derive optimal relational formulas between system parameters by analyzing performance charts
Learners can reduce design errors by 30% or more through case studies comparing conflicting system behaviors
Learners can perform four or more design iteration cycles using a software interface

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
